lecture.title: Lecture 0
lecture.subtitle: Do Not Remove!
lecture.author: Kyle Knox
lecture.description: Do not remove! This is here to prevent a bug when translating the XML into an associative array.

lecture.title: Alphabet Soup
lecture.subtitle: PHP, ASP, CSS, RoR, LAMP, DNS, SVN, JSON, SSI, TDD, RSS, HTTP, XSS, CSRF, WTF?
lecture.author: Kyle Knox
lecture.description: An introduction to common web technologies, focusing on the differences between front- and back-end, server, transport and developer technologies.
